contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish|Vise (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Visé |picture=|picture-legend= |map=Visé Liège Belgium Map.png |map-legend=The commune in the Liège Arrondissement<br />in the province of Liège |arms=Armoiries Visé.svg |flag=Flag of Visé.svg |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LG}} |arrondissement=[[Liège administrative Arrondissement|Liège]] |nis=62108 |pyramid-date |0-19= |20-64 |65 |foreigners= |foreigners-date |mayor=Marcel Neven ([[Mouvement Réformateur|MR]]) |majority=[[Mouvement Réformateur|MR]] - [[Centre Démocrate Humaniste|cdH]] |parties=[[Mouvement Réformateur|MR]]<br />[[Socialist Party (Belgium)|PS]]<br />[[Centre Démocrate Humaniste|cdH]]<br />[[Ecolo]] |seats='''25'''<br/>11<br/>10<br/>3<br/>1 |sections-name=Visé, [[Lanaye]], [[Lixhe]], [[Richelle]], [[Argenteau]], [[Cheratte]] |sections-postal=4600<br />4600<br />4600<br />4600<br />4601<br />4602 |postal-codes=4600-4602 |telephone-area=04 |web=[http://www.vise.be/ www.vise.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=44 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=42 }} '''Visé''' ({{IPA-fr|vi.ze}}; {{lang-nl|Wezet}}, {{IPA-nl|weː.zɛt}}) is a municipality and [[City status in Belgium|city]] of [[Belgium]], where it is located on the river [[Meuse river|Meuse]], in the [[Wallonia|Walloon]] province of [[Liège (province)|Liège]]. The municipality consists of the former municipalities of Visé, [[Lanaye]], [[Lixhe]], [[Richelle]], [[Argenteau]] and [[Cheratte]]. In the north-east (on the eastern bank of the Meuse river) the area of the municipality extends up to the village of [[Moelingen]] in the [[Limburg (Belgium)|Limburg]]ian [[Municipalities of Belgium|municipality]] of [[Voeren]], while in the north-west (on the western bank of the Meuse river) it extends up to the border between Belgium and the [[Netherlands]] (on the other side of which the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] municipality of [[Maastricht]] is situated). The city of Visé is located in a distance of some 20 km (12,4 miles) north eastern of Belgian [[Liège]] city and of some 15 km (9,3 miles) southern of the most southern [[Netherlands|Dutch]] city of [[Maastricht]]. Apart from the Meuse river another waterway, the [[Albert Canal]], passes through this town. == Gallery == <gallery> File:Visé - Hôtel de Ville 04.JPG|Visé town hall File:Visé - Casa de la Vila.jpg|Close up File:Hôtel de ville de Visé - Vue Arrière (3) - 62108-CLT-0001-01.jpg|Close up rear view File:Hôtel de ville de Visé - Vue Arrière (1) - 62108-CLT-0001-01.jpg|Rear view Image:Visé, straatzicht2 foto1 2010-07-11 11.26.JPG|Visé streetview File:Vise-Wezet.jpg|City view from westbank of the [[Meuse]] river File:Canal Albert Lanaye-30aug2008.jpg|[[Albert Canal]] at Lanaye File:Berwinne Barrage N602.jpg|View of [[Berwinne]] river near Lixhe </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Commonscat}} {{Liege municipalities}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vise}} [[Category:Municipalities of Liège (province)]] [[Category:Belgium–Netherlands border crossings]] {{Liege-geo-stub}}
